title: 36. Hey Baby, Is That a Prius You're Driving?
description: "Conspicuous conservation" is about showing off your environmental bona fides. In other words, if you lean green, there's extra value in being seen leaning green.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
